name: Barbatos
skill: Deals 534/654 DMG to all allies. Targets deal 41%/50% more DMG for a limited time.
ability: Moderately increases the number of soulstones received from battle.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a demon who defeated 36 armies. She appears on the battlefield as a hunter and takes out her foes with long-range sniping. She's also a walking dictionary that knows all about the past and future, and has other versatile skills, like mending bonds of friendship and locating where people hide their savings. Once she pushed her skills to the fullest, not only getting her hands on Mikado's secret stash, but living to tell about it after. That made her an instant legend around the Bureau.

main: "Their secret stash is at the back of the desk drawer."
summon: "Hey, someone keeps their stash over here!"
